00016 #include "thread.h"
00017 #include <assert.h>
00018 #include <errno.h>
00019 #include <algorithm>
00020 #include <sys/time.h>

00022 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 
00024 XPthreadMutex::XPthreadMutex()
00025 {
00026     pthread_mutexattr_t attr;
00027     int ret;
00028     ret = pthread_mutexattr_init(&attr);
00029     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00030 
00031     ret = pthread_mutex_init(&m_mutex, &attr);
00032     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00033 
00034     ret = pthread_mutexattr_destroy(&attr);
00035     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00036 }
00037 
00038 XPthreadMutex::~XPthreadMutex()
00039 {
00040     int ret = pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_mutex);
00041     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00042 }
00043 void
00044 XPthreadMutex::lock() {
00045     int ret = pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00046     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00047 }
00048 bool
00049 XPthreadMutex::trylock() {
00050     int ret = pthread_mutex_trylock(&m_mutex);
00051     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(ret != EINVAL);
00052     return (ret == 0);
00053 }
00054 void
00055 XPthreadMutex::unlock() {
00056     int ret = pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00057     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00058 }
00059 
00060 XPthreadCondition::XPthreadCondition() : XPthreadMutex()
00061 {
00062     int ret = pthread_cond_init(&m_cond, NULL);
00063     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00064 }
00065 XPthreadCondition::~XPthreadCondition()
00066 {
00067     int ret = pthread_cond_destroy(&m_cond);
00068     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00069 }
00070 int
00071 XPthreadCondition::wait(int usec)
00072 {
00073     int ret;
00074     if(usec > 0)
00075     {
00076         struct timespec abstime;
00077         timeval tv;
00078         long nsec;
00079         gettimeofday(&tv, NULL);
00080         abstime.tv_sec = tv.tv_sec;
00081         nsec = (tv.tv_usec + usec) * 1000;
00082         if(nsec >= 1000000000) {
00083             nsec -= 1000000000; abstime.tv_sec++;
00084         }
00085         abstime.tv_nsec = nsec;
00086         ret = pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_cond, &m_mutex, &abstime);
00087     }
00088     else {
00089         ret = pthread_cond_wait(&m_cond, &m_mutex);
00090     }
00091     return ret;
00092 }
00093 void 
00094 XPthreadCondition::signal()
00095 {
00096     int ret = pthread_cond_signal(&m_cond);
00097     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00098 }
00099 void 
00100 XPthreadCondition::broadcast()
00101 {
00102     int ret = pthread_cond_broadcast(&m_cond);
00103     if(DEBUG_XTHREAD) ASSERT(!ret);
00104 }
